projects.title: Pillminder - CUNY Hacks
projects.description: A web application used to assist in medication management, particularly among the elderly; by reading labels and sending text messages so there is one less thing to worry about.

projects.title: Face-Mask Detection
projects.description: Analyzed different machine learning algorithms for an image classifcation task. Compared accuracies: SVM 93%, CNN 97%, KNN 86%, and Decision Trees 84%

projects.title: ASL-Translator
projects.description: To alleviate the miscommunication between those who don't understand ASL and those who do, this is a web application that translate an image of the ASL to its corresponding letter.
